wcGeneSummary 0.99.0
  • Reference
  • Articles
    wcGeneSummary

    returnPyramid

    returnPyramid.Rd

    Return pyramid plots

    Usage

    returnPyramid(
  L,
  R,
  geneVec,
  geneVecType,
  filterWords,
  numberOfWords,
  orgDb,
  additionalRemove = NA,
  numOnly = TRUE,
  widths = c(0.3, 0.3, 0.3),
  lowCol = "blue",
  tfidf = FALSE,
  highCol = "red",
  madeUpper = c("rna", "dna")
)

    Arguments

    L

    genes in the cluster

    R

    genes in the other cluster

    geneVec

    gene-named vector of node names in dendrogram

    geneVecType

    type of the name of geneVec (default: ENSEMBL)

    filterWords

    words to filter based on frequency

    numberOfWords

    the number of words to plot

    orgDb

    database to change the ID to ENTREZ ID

    additionalRemove

    words to filter

    numOnly

    delete number only

    widths

    parameters to pass to patchwork

    lowCol

    gradient low color

    tfidf

    use tfidf

    highCol

    gradient high color

    madeUpper

    words with uppercase

    Value

    list of pyramid plot grobs and its positions

    On this page
